NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TabaTimer uses photos you provid for custom workout images. In order to use custom images for workouts, please allow TabaTimer to access Photos on your device.
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: TabaTimer uses photos you provid for custom workout images. In order to use custom images for workouts, please allow TabaTimer to access Photos on your device.
NSCameraUsageDescription: TabaTimer uses photos you provid for custom workout images. In order to use custom images for workouts, please allow TabaTimer to access Camera / Photos on your device.
NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: TabaTimer uses your name, email and your accounts id(if you choose to login by Apple/Facebook/Google) to create your account in our database. For uploading/downloading your timer settings, please allow tracking for TabaTimer to access these information.
